title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: December 29, 2022, 04:36:57 PMLast edit: December 29, 2022, 09:36:10 PM by minerjones
content: Presenting "The Dual Cryptocurrency" commissioned by collector wheresmycoinOriginal thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1561362This is a 1-of-a-kind dual cryptocurrency coinOne side features BTC and the other side shows ETHIt is large at 21.54oz and 10.2cm x 1.2cmIs it composed of 999 silver and then gold plated on the BTC side and rhodium plated on the ETH sideThe private key metal plates and gemstones (ruby,sapphire,emerald) have since been removed and are included with the coin and COA as seen belowThe first 3 pictures are credited to collector elianiteSTARTING BID: 0.250BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: JANUARY 3rd, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: That's a big coin. If you coin the BP manhole cover and the mini manhole as coins then this is Third Largest that I know of.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: One of the more unique pieces this community has seen in my opinion. I’ve always admired this piece and thought that one day I may want to own it. It has had its travels around the world if I do recall and has never really been duplicated. I can’t believe that someone opened it.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.created_time: January 03, 2023, 01:21:23 PMLast edit: January 03, 2023, 10:01:49 PM by minerjones
